tournaments.title: Upcoming Tournaments
tournaments.no_recent: You don't have any recent tournaments.

api_keys_management.api_keys_description: API keys allow you to authenticate with the 5Stack API programmatically.
api_keys_management.create_new_description: Create a new API key with a descriptive label to identify its purpose.
api_keys_management.label: Label
api_keys_management.label_description: Choose a descriptive name to identify this API key.
api_keys_management.delete_confirmation_description: Are you sure you want to delete the API key "{label}"? This action cannot be undone and any applications using this key will lose access.
api_keys_management.api_key_deleted_description: The API key has been deleted successfully.
api_keys_management.error_creating_description: Failed to create API key. Please try again.
api_keys_management.error_deleting_description: Failed to delete API key. Please try again.

copy_key_dialog.title: API Key Created
copy_key_dialog.description: Your new API key has been created successfully. Please copy it now as it won't be shown again.
copy_key_dialog.warning_message: This is the only time you'll be able to see this API key. Make sure to copy and store it securely.

unlink_dialog.title: Unlink Discord Account
unlink_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to unlink your Discord account? This will remove the connection between your 5Stack and Discord accounts.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.
appearance.theme_description: Select the theme for the dashboard.

telemetry.title: Telemetry
telemetry.telemetry_description: Help improve 5stack by sharing anonymous usage data.

matchmaking.title: Matchmaking
matchmaking.description: Matchmaking allows players to join a queue and be matched with other players.

discord.title: Discord
discord.webhook_description: We use this discord webhook to send notifications that require action from a player. Ex. match issues, bugs, etc.
discord.support_role_description: This role will be pinged when used for support actions. You can get the Role ID from the Discord application by turning on developer mode and right clicking and copy id.

streaming.title: Streaming
streaming.minimum_role_to_stream: Minimum Role Allowed to Connect to TV (Delayed)
streaming.minimum_role_to_stream_description: This role will be able to connect to TV.
streaming.minimum_role_to_spectate: Minimum Role Allowed to Spectate (No Delay)
streaming.minimum_role_to_spectate_description: This role will be able to connect and spectate matches.

application.create_matches_role: Minimum Role Allowed to Create Matches
application.create_matches_role_description: This role will be able to create matches.
application.create_tournaments_role: Minimum Role Allowed to Create Tournaments
application.create_tournaments_role_description: This role will be able to create tournaments.
application.dedicated_servers_min_role_to_connect: Minimum Role to Connect to Dedicated Password-Protected Servers
application.dedicated_servers_min_role_to_connect_de: Only players at or above this role may connect to dedicated servers that require a password.
application.matchmaking_min_role: Minimum Role Allowed to Join Matchmaking
application.matchmaking_min_role_description: This role will be able to join matchmaking.
application.max_acceptable_latency_description: This is the maximum latency that a player can have to join a match.
application.auto_cancel_duration_description: This is the duration in minutes that a match will be auto canceled if not started within the duration.

players.force_name_registration_description: If forced to have player registration, the player will be required to submit a name that will be used on the platform.

servers.title: Server Settings
servers.enable_cpu_pinning_description: Enable CPU pinning on game server nodes for better performance
servers.number_of_cpus_per_server_description: Number of CPUs to allocate per server

demo_settings.title: Demo Settings
demo_settings.max_storage_description: The maximum storage size for the demo files in GB.
demo_settings.cloudflare_worker_url_description: The URL of the Cloudflare worker that will be used to store and retrieve the demo files.
demo_settings.min_retention_description: The minimum retention days for the demo files.
demo_settings.test_s3_description: Test the S3 connection and upload a file to the demo bucket.

update_map_pools.title: Automatic Update Map Pools
update_map_pools.description: Automatically add / update map pools when new maps are added or removed from the active duty pool.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application interface.

matchmaking.title: Matchmaking Settings
matchmaking.description: Configure your matchmaking preferences and view region latencies.
matchmaking.max_latency_description: If no regions are preferred, matchmaking will only use regions with latency below this value.

regions.title: Regions
regions.description: Regions allow you to group game servers by geographic location. Players can select preferred regions during matchmaking and veto undesired regions during match setup.

table.name: Name
table.use_steam_relay_description: Enable Steam Relay for game servers to hide their IP address from the public.

delete.title: Delete Region
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this region? This action cannot be undone.

open_matches.title: Open Matches
open_matches.description: Matches that are open lobbies for anyone to join.

create_page.title: Create Match
create_page.pick_up_game_description: A Pick up game does not require selection of teams.
create_page.intra_team_scrimmage: You can select the same team for both slots to create an intra-team scrimmage.

game_server_nodes.title: Game Server Nodes
game_server_nodes.description: Game server nodes expand your server offerings into different regions or provide redundancy for on-demand servers.

not_supported.title: Your Panel currently does not support Game Server Nodes.
not_supported.description: View the documentation to setup Game Server Nodes.

table.pin_build_id_tooltip: Pin the build ID of the CS2 server

dedicated_servers.title: Dedicated Servers
dedicated_servers.description: You can set up a dedicated server that will always run the game server mod

detail.config_location: This config should be placed in:

status.no_rcon: Server is connected but RCON is not available
status.connected: Server is connected and RCON is available
status.plugin_version_mismatch: plugin version is not up to date

delete_confirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
delete_confirm.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your server and remove associated data from our servers.

public_servers.title: Public Servers
public_servers.no_public_servers: No public servers available at the moment.

map_pools.title: Default Map Pools
map_pools.description: Manage map pools and available maps for matchmaking.

form.name: Name
form.name_description: This must match the name of the map in the game that the server recognizes.
form.label: Label

delete_confirm.title: Delete Map
delete_confirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this map? This action cannot be undone.

error.invalid_workshop: Invalid workshop map ID. Please verify the ID exists on Steam Workshop.

manage_matches.title: Manage Matches
manage_matches.description: View and manage all matches across the platform.

custom_match.title: Custom Match
custom_match.description: Create and customize your own match. Set rules, choose maps, and invite friends for a personalized gaming experience.

account_settings.title: Account Settings
account_settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

system_update.title: System Update Available
system_update.note: Please note: It will take a few minutes to process and verify the new updates.
system_update.fix_link: If a system upgrade persists, you may need to fix your versions
system_update.panel_update: Your panel is out of date, pull and run the update script

logout_dialog.title: Logout
logout_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to logout?

install.title: Add to Home Screen
install.description: This website offers app-like features. Add it to your home screen for easy access.

common.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to run this command?

error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

join.title: Join Tournament
join.requirements: You need at least {count} players to join this tournament

form.description_help: Create a new tournament for your community
form.name: Tournament Name

stage.delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete this stage?
stage.advances_to_next_stage: Winners advance to the next stage
stage.groups_placeholder: Enter number of groups for this stage...

organizer.title: Tournament Organizers
organizer.name: Name
organizer.no_organizers_description: No organizers have been added to this tournament yet
organizer.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this organizer?
organizer.remove_description: This will remove the organizer from the tournament

team.name: Team Name
team.confirm_remove_member: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
team.remove_member_description: This will remove the member from the tournament team
team.confirm_cancel_invite: Are you sure you want to cancel this invite?
team.cancel_invite_description: This will cancel the invite for this member

upcoming.empty: You don't have any upcoming tournaments.

server.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this server?
server.remove_description: This will remove the server from the tournament

invite.tournament_message: You have been invited to join a tournament
invite.team_message: You have been invited to join a team

confirm.leave: Are you sure you want to leave this team?

delete.title: Delete Team
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this team? This action cannot be undone.

member.confirm_cancel_invite: Are you sure you want to cancel this invite?
member.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
member.cancel_invite_description: This will cancel the invite for this member
member.remove_description: This will remove the member from the team

my_upcoming.no_matches: You don't have any upcoming matches.

best_of.label: Best Of
best_of.description: The winner is determined by who wins the majority of a specified number of games

map_veto_settings.label: Map Veto
map_veto_settings.description: Map Veto process: team 1 ban, team 2 ban, team 1 pick, team 2 pick side, team 2 pick, team 1 pick side, team 2 ban. Process repeats until final map is selected
map_veto_settings.custom_pool_tooltip: Choosing a custom map pool allows you to select maps outside the current active duty pool

overtime.label: Overtime
overtime.description: Each overtime is a best of 6.

knife_round.label: Knife Round
knife_round.description: Knife rounds are only played when neither team picked the map in the veto.

max_rounds.label: Max Rounds
max_rounds.description: The number of rounds played before teams switch sides.

region.title: Region Settings

veto.label: Veto
veto.description: Allows teams to veto and select the server region.

region.description: Select preferred regions for the match.

substitutes.label: Number of Substitutes
substitutes.description: Adds additional slots to be added to each lineup.

tactical.label: Tactical Timeout Settings
tactical.description: Tactical Timeouts are called by typing .tac, and are 30 seconds long.

technical.label: Technical Timeout Settings
technical.description: Technical timeouts are called by typing .pause, and do not have a time limit.

ready_settings.label: Ready Settings
ready_settings.description: Controls how the match determines to be ready to start.

options.everyone: All Players Required to be Ready

map_veto.select_side: Select the Side your team wants to start on

lineup.discord_user: This is a Discord user, register your discord id to enable stat tracking by typing

check_in.title: Check In
check_in.description: Please check in to confirm your participation in this match

sanction.reason_description: Please provide a clear reason for this sanction

registration.title: Register your name
registration.description: This name will be used for all matches / tournaments you participate in.
registration.warning: This name cannot be changed after being submitted

change_name.title: Change Name
change_name.description: Please enter the name you would like to change to.
change_name.request_description: Please enter the name you would like to change your account to.

lobby.access_description: Controls who can join the lobby. Open allows anyone to join, Friends allows only friends to join, and Invite allows only players you invite to join.

matchmaking.temp_banned: You are temporarily banned from matchmaking
matchmaking.high_latency_warning: Your latency is too high for competitive matches

game_server.overprovisioned_warning_description: You have assigned {total_server_count} possible servers, but your server can only support {max_servers} servers.
game_server.version_pinning_not_supported: Version pinning is not supported on this server.

validation.start_port_less_than_end: Start port range must be less than end port range
validation.end_port_greater_than_start: End port range must be greater than start port range by at least 2

toast.cs_updating: CS2 is being updated on the node

revert_confirm.description: Are you sure you want to revert this config to its default values? This action cannot be undone.
